page.title: 01WOODHALL SPA
page.content: SITUATED SOME 20 MILES TO THE SOUTH_EAST OF THE CATHEDRAL CITY OF LINCOLN, WOODHALL SPA IS A DELIGHTFUL INLAND RESORT, SET AGAINST THE BACK_DROP OF MAGNIFICENT PINE AND BIRCH WOODS.THIS BEAUTIFULLY KEPT LITTLE TOWN OFFERS VISITORS AN ATMOSPHERE OF PEACE AND RELAXATION AND IS AN IDEAL VENUE FOR THOSE QUIET WEEKENDS OR LONGER STAYS WHICH EVERYONE NEEDS FROM TIME TO TIME. POPULAR WITH MANY VISITORS ARE THE WALKS THROUGH THE WOODLANDS, ESPECIALLY WHEN THE RHODODENDRONS,A FAMOUS FEATURE OF THE TOWN, ARE IN FULL BLOOM. RECREATIONAL AMENITIES INCLUDE A CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE, TENNIS COURTS, BOWLING GREEN, A SWIMMING POOL AND A HOST OF OTHER PURSUITS, WHILST HERITAGE LOVERS CAN EXPLORE THE TOWER ON THE MOOR,THOUGHT TO BE THE REMAINS
